category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
It is amazing love
that You sent Your Son to suffer in my place,
that You added the Spirit to teach, comfort, and guide me,
and that You've let angels build a wall of protection around me.
All of heaven is working for the good of someone as small as me.

Allow Your unseen servants to always be active on my behalf,
and to rejoice when I grow in Your grace.
Don't let them rest until my struggle is over
and I'm standing victorious with You.

Please, let my tendency toward evil, my lack of passion for what is good, and my resistance to Your Spirit
never be enough to make You abandon me.
May my hard heart move You to pity, not to anger.
And if the enemy gains an advantage because of my own sin,
let it be an opportunity to prove that heaven is mightier than hell,
and that those who are for me are greater than those who are against me.

Come and help me with all Your promised blessings.
Keep me feeding on the strength of Your Word,
searching the Scriptures to find You there.

If my wandering away brings discipline,
help me to accept the correction humbly,
to bless the hand that corrects me,
to understand the reason for it,
to respond quickly, and to get back to the basics.
Let all of Your fatherly actions in my life help me to share in Your holiness.

Let every time I fall cause me to sink lower on my knees,
and when I rise, let it be to a higher level of devotion.
May my every burden be used to make me holy,
every loss be turned into a gain,
every sacrifice a spiritual advantage,
every dark day be lit by the Holy Spirit,
and every night of struggle become a song.
